summary: Fixed 3 bugs in himalaya plugin: added nil check in move command format_item, converted search keymaps from nvim_buf_set_keymap to vim.keymap.set, and fixed compose send to call send_email(buf).

artifacts.summary: Added defensive nil/type check in format_item function
Converted nvim_buf_set_keymap to vim.keymap.set with proper options
Fixed send function call from send() to send_email(buf)

completion_data.completion_summary: Fixed 3 confirmed bugs in himalaya email plugin: added defensive nil check in move command format_item function, converted search keymaps from incorrect nvim_buf_set_keymap API to proper vim.keymap.set, and fixed compose send keymap to call correct send_email(buf) function.

next_steps: Test changes manually by opening himalaya: move email with m key, search with /, compose with Ctrl-S
